#+TITLE: French Verb Drill: Emotions and Feelings
#+AUTHOR: Generated by verbiste.el
#+STARTUP: overview

* Introduction

This drill focuses on verbs related to emotions and emotional reactions.
Practice conjugating these verbs in different tenses and using them in sentences.

* Verbs in this group

1. apitoyer
2. courroucer
3. affoler
4. culpabiliser
5. confesser
6. aimer
7. détester
8. craindre
9. s'inquiéter
10. se réjouir

* Example Sentences

- Son histoire m'apitoie. (His story makes me feel pity.)
- Cette nouvelle me courrouce. (This news angers me.)
- Le bruit soudain l'affole. (The sudden noise panics her.)
